entries.context: A natural language name identifying the value set. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.
A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the value set.
The name of the organization or individual responsible for the release and ongoing maintenance of the value set.
entries.source: Ministerio de Salud de Costa Rica

entries.context: The name of an individual to contact.
entries.source: Ministerio de Salud de Costa Rica

entries.context: A free text natural language description of the value set from a consumer's perspective. The textual description specifies the span of meanings for concepts to be included within the Value Set Expansion, and also may specify the intended use and limitations of the Value Set.
entries.source: Listado de países según la norma ISO 3166-1 alpha-3

entries.context: A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.
A copyright statement relating to the value set and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the value set.
entries.source: Usado con el permiso de HL7 International, todos los derechos resevados en los Licencias de HL7 Internacional.
